casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. John C. HOSHOR and United Bankers Corporation, Defendants-Appellants. No. 321. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 5, 1930. David P. Siegel, of New York City, for appellants. ' Charles H. Tuttle, U. S. Atty., of New York City (Lowell Wadmond, Asst. U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y., of counsel), for the United States.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
